name: Blanksword
storyline:
You have no memories, except for one: a single eye and a cruel smile as you got stabbed in the dark. You left your home looking for answers and you won’t stop until you get back at the Angel that betrayed and left you for dead.

God’s country is in chaos: dangerous and bizarre creatures, such as talking mushrooms and landlords, roam the land and the dead rise back to life under an eternal daylight. Will you cut your enemies down, burn them to a crisp, poison them or strike terror into their hearts with the power of philosophy? With hundreds of skills and items to choose from, His country is your oyster!
summary: You’re a fallen Angel, your brain is missing and half of God’s country wants you dead (again!). Battle legions of weird monsters with your smiling sword. Find and customize a large number of skills. Rebuild your brain from scratch and rise against a tyrannical God in this turn-based roguelike RPG!
